channel.title: Comments on: Cherry Compote, Vanilla Bean Custard and Vienna Almond Cream Trifle

item.title: By: grace
item.dc:creator: grace
item.description: trifles are so elegant and beautiful, and this one's no exception. i love the red cherries contrasting with the white custard. nicely done!
item.content:encoded: trifles are so elegant and beautiful, and this one’s no exception. i love the red cherries contrasting with the white custard. nicely done!

item.title: By: Sara
item.dc:creator: Sara
item.description: What a delicious looking dessert! I'm cooking with cherries today too, great minds think alike :)
item.content:encoded: What a delicious looking dessert! I’m cooking with cherries today too, great minds think alike ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: lexi
item.dc:creator: lexi
item.description:
Yay! Trifle! It reminds me of parties my (Australian) grandmother used to have when we were kids. There was always trifle. But it never had cherries: this is the Queen of trifles. Will be making very soon...
Thanks!
item.content:encoded:
Yay! Trifle! It reminds me of parties my (Australian) grandmother used to have when we were kids. There was always trifle. But it never had cherries: this is the Queen of trifles. Will be making very soon…

Thanks!

item.title: By: Beansprout
item.dc:creator: Beansprout
item.description: you know I myself have never tried Trifle before... always want to try but when got chance, always choose others... Since now I must try it soon.. your spong looks so fluffly and light
item.content:encoded: you know I myself have never tried Trifle before… always want to try but when got chance, always choose others… Since now I must try it soon.. your spong looks so fluffly and light

item.title: By: Lorraine @NotQuiteNigella
item.dc:creator: Lorraine @NotQuiteNigella
item.description: That looks magnificent :) Such a perfect bowl for your heavenly sounding trifle!
item.content:encoded: That looks magnificent ðŸ™‚ Such a perfect bowl for your heavenly sounding trifle!

item.description: It's been years since I had trifle, very nice comfort type of dessert :)
